title: Solid Cotton Twill Pro Style Cap - Black
features: One size fits most with adjustable plastic snap closure, fitting up to 7 1/2.
Crown measures 3 1/2 inches deep, 6 panels, constructed, high profile.
Bill measures 2 3/4 inches long, pre curved, same color under bill.
description: The Solid Cotton Twill Pro Style Cap is a perfect baseball cap for all of your activities, whether you're going out with friends, for a walk, or to play some sports. The high-profile cap has a well-defined crown with 6 panels. The two frontal panels are reinforced to maintain the high-profile front. The bill is pre-curved, and it features a snapback closure on its back for an adjustable fit. The ball cap is also good for embroidering your favorite or work logo! It comes in many colors to suit your needs. Made of 35% cotton and 65% polyester. One size fits most with adjustable plastic snap closure, fitting up to 7 1/2. Crown measures 3 1/2 inches deep, 6 panels, constructed, high profile. Bill measures 2 3/4 inches long, pre curved, same color under bill. Thick, soft and light material. Hand wash only. Available in many colors. Imported
